name: Underground Adventure (itch) (Kethram)
description:
Claire is  walking  home through the forest when suddenly the ground beneath her feet gives way...

Can you help her find her way back to the surface?

-------------------------------------------------

This is my first Ren'Py project. All images and animations were made in Unity.

It's not a finished product yet. The first part is how I wanted all of it to look (with mouseovers). I was running out of time for the jam, so decided to leave the rest with just the text options.

I haven't fully tested the maze, there might be some glitches there. Please leave a comment if you come across one and I'll fix it (after the jam has finished).

CREDITS: 

Story and design: Kethram's Games

Programmer: Imelda Weijers (aka Kethram)

Models: Synty Studios

Music: Ultimate Music Bundle
